channel.title: Best server base for 317 deob? Need a decent one
channel.description:
Well I have shard at the minute but idk.. Just need to see if theres any better.
I dont want to edit the client etc (more so I don't know how to edit it to work with sources like devo etc)
It's got old fally and when I try with devo it says T2 error etc.. Anyone know how to fix?
Need suggestions or someone to tell me how to fix to make it work with Devo 2.7
